name: Munchlax
flavorText:
It wolfs down its weight in food
once a day, swallowing food whole
with almost no chewing.

previous.name: Garchomp
previous.flavorText:
When it folds up its body and
extends its wings, it looks like a
jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

next.name: Riolu
next.flavorText:
The aura that emanates from its
body intensifies to alert others
if it is afraid or sad.

pokemon.name: Munchlax
pokemon.flavorText:
It wolfs down its weight in food
once a day, swallowing food whole
with almost no chewing.

pokemon.name: Snorlax
pokemon.flavorText:
Very lazy. Just
eats and sleeps.
As its rotund bulk builds, it
becomes steadily
more slothful.
